Package com.atlan.exception

Class AtlanException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
com.atlan.exception.AtlanException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApiConnectionException, ApiException, AuthenticationException, ConflictException, InvalidRequestException, LockedException, LogicException, NotFoundException
public abstract class AtlanException extends Exception
Base class for any error raised by interactions with Atlan's APIs.
See Also:
